experiences.description: Specialized in building fast, performant web and mobile applications. Extensively worked on integrating AI agents into user-facing products, leveraging intelligent automation to enhance user experiences.
achievements: Designed scalable front-end architectures with React and Next.js for enterprise applications
Set up clean, maintainable codebases using TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, and modular design principles
Developed and integrated AI agents to automate complex workflows and enhance interactivity
Benchmarked and performance tuned Node.js and frontend environments for optimal performance
Wrote comprehensive unit, integration, and E2E tests with Jest, React Testing Library, and Playwright

experiences.description: Focused on building a scalable design system to support a wide range of client websites. Combined hands-on development with system architecture to drive consistency, efficiency, and maintainability across projects.
achievements: Architected and implemented comprehensive design system adopted across multiple client websites
Built and documented reusable UI components using TypeScript and Storybook
Integrated legacy jQuery components into modern system ensuring backward compatibility
Standardized visual styles and interactions to deliver consistent user experiences at scale
Improved developer productivity through shared design tokens and clear component guidelines
Used Storybook as a centralized platform for component development, testing, and team collaboration

experiences.description: Led frontend development for a metabox platform integrating cryptocurrency and NFT functionality. Responsible for architectural design and team growth through recruitment and mentorship.
achievements: Designed front-end architecture to support web3 features with crypto wallets and NFT interactions
Led frontend development using React, Next.js, and TypeScript
Set up and maintained scalable, maintainable codebases following best practices
Refactored legacy code for improved performance, modularity, and readability
Conducted performance benchmarking and optimization to ensure smooth UX
Actively participated in recruitment and provided mentorship to junior developers

experiences.description: Worked on building fast and performant web and mobile applications using a versatile stack. Contributed across both frontend and backend layers to deliver scalable, maintainable solutions.
achievements: Developed web and mobile interfaces using React, Angular, and Ionic
Built and maintained backend services and APIs with Node.js and Express
Designed front-end architectures to support long-term scalability and code reuse
Set up and organized clean, maintainable fullstack codebases
Performed benchmarking and performance optimization across the stack
Wrote comprehensive unit, integration, and E2E tests using tools like Jest, Mocha, and Cypress

experiences.description: Contributed to multiple fintech and telecom services, ranging from bill payments to smartphone resale platforms. Role spanned feature development, system integration, and backend service maintenance.
achievements: Built a bills payment service enabling secure and scalable transactions
Maintained and enhanced smartphone resale platform and refill service
Refactored legacy code and developed new features to improve system stability and UX
Implemented and consumed REST APIs ensuring efficient data flow
Integrated services through Enterprise Service Bus (ESB) for API mediation and orchestration
Wrote and maintained comprehensive unit, integration, and E2E tests using Jest, Mocha, and Cypress
